TextpageLeftNav.bodyText:
TableTable

Provides NoSQL storage for unstructured and semi-structured data. Suitable for web applications, address books, and other user data.

Apply for 1RMB Trial Buy Now

Pricing Details

This table lists non-structured data and semi-structured data provided to NoSQL storage, suitable for Web applications, address books and other user data.

Data Storage Pricing

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

Monthly storage capacity Locally redundant storage (LRS) Geo-Redundant Storage (GRS) Read-access Redundant Storage (RA-GRS)
0 to 1TB1 ￥ 0.72/GB ￥ 0.95/GB ￥ 1.21/GB
1 TB to 50 TB ¥ 0.57/GB ￥ 0.80/GB ￥ 1.02/GB
More than 50 TB ¥ 0.54/GB ￥ 0.74/GB ￥ 0.94/GB

1 1 TB = 1,024GB

Operation and Data Transfer Pricing

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

Locally redundant storage (LRS) Geo-Redundant Storage (GRS)
Place table and create container operations (per 10,000 counted) ￥ 0.02 ￥ 0.04
Batch processing to place table, create container operation (by 10,000) ￥ 0.02 ￥ 0.04
List container operation(per 10,000 counted) ￥ 0.02 ¥ 0.02
Reads (per 10,000 counted) ¥ 0.02 ¥ 0.02
Scan container operation (per 10,000 counted) ￥ 0.04 ¥ 0.04
Table deletion (per 10,000 counted) ￥ 0.02 ¥ 0.02

Region

Storage services are available in the following regions:

Territory Region
Mainland China China North, China East

Support & SLA

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support and select self-help service or any other method to contact us for support.

We guarantee that we can successfully process data reading requests from an Read-access Redundant Storage (RA-GRS) account at least 99.99% of the time (99.9% for the Cool Access Tier), provided that we will retry in the secondary zone from the data writing failure from the primary zone.

We guarantee that we can successfully process data reading from Locally redundant storage (LRS) and Geo Redundant Storage (GRS) accounts at least 99.9% of the time (99% for the Cool Access Tier)

We guarantee that we can successfully process data writing requests into Locally redundant storage (LRS) and geo-redundant storage (GRS) accounts and read and access Read-access Redundant Storage (RA-GRS) accounts at least 99.9% of the time (99% for the Cool Access Tier).

To learn more about the details of our Service Level Agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreements page.

The Managed Disk itself doesn’t provide a Service Level Agreement with financial support. The availability of a Managed Disk depends on the Service Level Agreement governing the basic storage used and the Virtual Machine it’s attached to. To learn more about the details of the Service Level Agreement of the Managed Disk, please visit the Managed Disk Service Level Agreements page.
